title: Valence Security Audit Insights
description: This dashboard provides detailed visibility into user and system activities, capturing configuration changes, access events, and administrative actions.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a centralized view of Valence Security audit logs, enabling teams to monitor, investigate, and analyze audit activity across connected platforms. It includes visualizations for user actions, authentication events, top users, and associated client IP and geolocation data.

For more information, see the [Valence Security integration documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/valence_security/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the displayed time range.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
This group provides a high-level overview of audit activity, including audit log trends, top users and actions, associated client IP and geolocation data, and detailed audit logs.
This group provides insights into audit activity, including login attempt trends, user creation and deletion activity, and policy modifications.

definition.title: Connectors created vs deleted over time

query.query_string: source:valence-security service:audit-logs @evt.name:("Connector created" OR "Connector deleted" OR "Authenticate connector") $action $event_outcome $user_name $client_ip
source:valence-security service:audit-logs @evt.name:("Policy created or updated" OR "Policy disabled") $action $event_outcome $user_name $client_ip
